history.content:
We’re looking for students from any and all academic fields to become Connector Assistants for Data Science Undergraduate Studies (DSUS) in Fall 2021.

 

Connector Assistants (CAs) will play a critical role in improving and expanding the data science curriculum at Berkeley. They will work closely with an instructor of Data Science Connector courses to provide students a fantastic opportunity to explore applications of data science in subjects such as biology and business. CAs will not only help students during lab and office hours, but also advise instructors on developing their course.

 

Responsibilities: 6-8 hours per week

  • Advise instructors regarding course content

  • Administer and assist with labs during class

  • Hold weekly office hours

  • Curriculum development (if applicable)

 

Please view this page for more information on the role.

 

Please email Harold Cha at haroldcha@berkeley.edu if you are interested! Applications will be released in early August 2021.
history.subject: Fall 2021 Student Opportunities - Become a Connector Assistant!
